verses.text: \w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w διαγενομένου|strong="G1230"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w σαββάτου|strong="G4521"\w*, \w Μαρία|strong="G3137"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Μαγδαληνὴ|strong="G3094"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w Μαρία|strong="G3137"\w*\f + \fr 16:1 \ft μαρια \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [88%] HF,RP,CP ¦ 1 η του A,B [2%] TR,OC[NU] ¦ 1 η ℵC,W [10%] ¦ D has a long omission\f* \w Ἰακώβου|strong="G2385"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w Σαλώμη|strong="G4539"\w* \w ἠγόρασαν|strong="G0059"\w*\f + \fr 16:1 \ft ηγορασαν \+it rell\+it* ¦ ηγωρασαν CP\f* \w ἀρώματα|strong="G0759"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w ἐλθοῦσαι|strong="G2064"\w* \w ἀλείψωσιν|strong="G0218"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἰησοῦν|strong="G2424"\w*.\f + \fr 16:1 \ft τον ιησουν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [30%] CP ¦ αυτον ℵA,B,C(D)W [70%] HF,RP,TR,OC,NU\f* Resurrection Day—Sunday, 04/07/30 AD Women go to sepulcher

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w λίαν|strong="G3029"\w* \w πρωῒ|strong="G4404"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μιᾶς|strong="G1520"\w*\f + \fr 16:2 \ft της μιας \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C [97%] HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ 2 D ¦ 12 των [1%] ¦ τη μια των ℵ [1.5%] NU ¦ μια των B,W ¦ μια [0.5%]\f* \w σαββάτων|strong="G4521"\w*, \w ἔρχονται|strong="G2064"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μνημεῖον|strong="G3419"\w*, \w ἀνατείλαντος|strong="G0393"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἡλίου|strong="G2246"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἔλεγον|strong="G3004"\w* \w πρὸς|strong="G4314"\w* \w ἑαυτάς|strong="G1438"\w*, «\w Τίς|strong="G5100"\w* \w ἀποκυλίσει|strong="G0617"\w* \w ἡμῖν|strong="G1473"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w λίθον|strong="G3037"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w θύρας|strong="G2374"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μνημείου|strong="G3419"\w*;»

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀναβλέψασαι|strong="G0308"\w* \w θεωροῦσιν|strong="G2334"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w ἀποκεκύλισται|strong="G0617"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w λίθος|strong="G3037"\w* (\w ἦν|strong="G1510"\w* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w μέγας|strong="G3173"\w* \w σφόδρα|strong="G4970"\w*).

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w εἰσελθοῦσαι|strong="G1525"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μνημεῖον|strong="G3419"\w* \w εἶδον|strong="G3708"\w* \w νεανίσκον|strong="G3495"\w* \w καθήμενον|strong="G2521"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w δεξιοῖς|strong="G1188"\w* \w περιβεβλημένον|strong="G4016"\w* \w στολὴν|strong="G4749"\w* \w λευκήν|strong="G3022"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐξεθαμβήθησαν|strong="G1568"\w*.

\w Ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w λέγει|strong="G3004"\w* \w αὐταῖς|strong="G0846"\w*· «\w Μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w ἐκθαμβεῖσθε|strong="G1568"\w*. \w Ἰησοῦν|strong="G2424"\w* \w ζητεῖτε|strong="G2212"\w*, \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ναζαρηνόν|strong="G3479"\w*, \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐσταυρωμένον|strong="G4717"\w*. \w Ἠγέρθη|strong="G1453"\w*, \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἔστιν|strong="G1510"\w* \w ὧδε|strong="G5602"\w*· \w ἴδε|strong="G3708"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w τόπος|strong="G5117"\w* \w ὅπου|strong="G3699"\w* \w ἔθηκαν|strong="G5087"\w* \w αὐτόν|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Ἀλλ|strong="G0235"\w*᾿\f + \fr 16:7 \ft αλλ \+it rell\+it* ¦ αλλα ℵA,B,C,D,W [2%] NU\f* \w ὑπάγετε|strong="G5217"\w*, \w εἴπατε|strong="G3004"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μαθηταῖς|strong="G3101"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Πέτρῳ|strong="G4074"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* ‹\w Προάγει|strong="G4254"\w* \w ὑμᾶς|strong="G4771"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w Γαλιλαίαν|strong="G1056"\w*· \w ἐκεῖ|strong="G1563"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w ὄψεσθε|strong="G3708"\w*, \w καθὼς|strong="G2531"\w* \w εἶπεν|strong="G3004"\w* \w ὑμῖν|strong="G4771"\w*.› »

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐξελθοῦσαι|strong="G1831"\w*\f + \fr 16:8 \ft εξελθουσαι \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 ταχυ [5%] TR\f* \w ἔφυγον|strong="G5343"\w* \w ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μνημείου|strong="G3419"\w*, \w εἶχεν|strong="G2192"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w*\f + \fr 16:8 \ft δε \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C [99.5%] HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ γαρ ℵBD(W) [0.5%] NU\f* \w αὐτὰς|strong="G0846"\w* \w τρόμος|strong="G5156"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἔκστασις|strong="G1611"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐδενὶ|strong="G3762"\w* \w οὐδὲν|strong="G3762"\w* \w εἶπον|strong="G3004"\w*, \w ἐφοβοῦντο|strong="G5399"\w* \w γάρ|strong="G1063"\w*.\f + \fr 16:8 \ft have verses 9-20 \+it rell\+it* [[NU]] ¦ — ℵB (For a full discussion of this variant, please see Appendix E in my, \+it The Identity of the New Testament Text IV\+it*.)\f* Jesus appears to the Magdalene, first

\w Ἀναστὰς|strong="G0450"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἰησοῦς|strong="G2424"\w*\f + \fr 16:9 \ft ο ιησους \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [30%] CP ¦ — A,C,D,W [70%] HF,RP,TR,OC,NU (ℵB omit verses 9-20 and NU puts them in double brackets.)\f* \w πρωῒ|strong="G4404"\w* \w πρώτῃ|strong="G4413"\w* \w σαββάτου|strong="G4521"\w*, \w ἐφάνη|strong="G5316"\w* \w πρῶτον|strong="G4412"\w* \w Μαρίᾳ|strong="G3137"\w* \w τῇ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Μαγδαληνῇ|strong="G3094"\w*, \w ἀφ|strong="G0575"\w*᾿\f + \fr 16:9 \ft αφ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A [98%] HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ παρ C,D,W [2%] NU\f* \w ἧς|strong="G3739"\w*\f + \fr 16:9 \ft ης \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 και CP\f* \w ἐκβεβλήκει|strong="G1544"\w* \w ἑπτὰ|strong="G2033"\w* \w δαιμόνια|strong="G1140"\w*.

\w Ἐκείνη|strong="G1565"\w* \w πορευθεῖσα|strong="G4198"\w* \w ἀπήγγειλεν|strong="G0518"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μετ|strong="G3326"\w*᾿ \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w γενομένοις|strong="G1096"\w*, \w πενθοῦσιν|strong="G3996"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w κλαίουσιν|strong="G2799"\w*.

\w Κἀκεῖνοι|strong="G2548"\w*, \w ἀκούσαντες|strong="G0191"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w ζῇ|strong="G2198"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐθεάθη|strong="G2300"\w* \w ὑπ|strong="G5259"\w*᾿ \w αὐτῆς|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ἠπίστησαν|strong="G0569"\w*. Emmaus\f + \fr 16:12 \ft [This was either the third or the fourth appearance; the 2nd was to the women; Jesus also appeared to Peter, but the Text does not permit us to know for sure if it was before or after Emmaus.]\f*

\w Μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ταῦτα|strong="G3778"\w* \w δυσὶν|strong="G1417"\w* \w ἐξ|strong="G1537"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w* \w περιπατοῦσιν|strong="G4043"\w* \w ἐφανερώθη|strong="G5319"\w*, \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w ἑτέρᾳ|strong="G2087"\w* \w μορφῇ|strong="G3444"\w*, \w πορευομένοις|strong="G4198"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w ἀγρόν|strong="G0068"\w*.

\w Κἀκεῖνοι|strong="G2548"\w* \w ἀπελθόντες|strong="G0565"\w* \w ἀπήγγειλαν|strong="G0518"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w λοιποῖς|strong="G3062"\w*· \w οὐδὲ|strong="G3761"\w* \w ἐκείνοις|strong="G1565"\w* \w ἐπίστευσαν|strong="G4100"\w*. Jesus appears to the ‘Eleven’, fifth

\w Ὕστερον|strong="G5305"\w*\f + \fr 16:14 \ft υστερον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* C,W [98%] HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ 1 δε A,D [2%] [NU]\f* \w ἀνακειμένοις|strong="G0345"\w* \w αὐτοῖς|strong="G0846"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἕνδεκα|strong="G1733"\w* \w ἐφανερώθη|strong="G5319"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὠνείδισεν|strong="G3679"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀπιστίαν|strong="G0570"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w σκληροκαρδίαν|strong="G4641"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w θεασαμένοις|strong="G2300"\w* \w αὐτὸν|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἐγηγερμένον|strong="G1453"\w*\f + \fr 16:14 \ft εγηγερμενον \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 εκ νεκρων A,C (10.7%)\f* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἐπίστευσαν|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w εἶπεν|strong="G3004"\w* \w αὐτοῖς|strong="G0846"\w*· «\w Πορευθέντες|strong="G4198"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w κόσμον|strong="G2889"\w* \w ἅπαντα|strong="G0537"\w*, \w κηρύξατε|strong="G2784"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w εὐαγγέλιον|strong="G2098"\w* \w πάσῃ|strong="G3956"\w* \w τῇ|strong="G3588"\w* \w κτίσει|strong="G2937"\w*.

\w Ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πιστεύσας|strong="G4100"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w βαπτισθεὶς|strong="G0907"\w* \w σωθήσεται|strong="G4982"\w*· \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἀπιστήσας|strong="G0569"\w* \w κατακριθήσεται|strong="G2632"\w*.

\w Σημεῖα|strong="G4592"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w πιστεύσασιν|strong="G4100"\w* \w ταῦτα|strong="G3778"\w* \w παρακολουθήσει|strong="G3877"\w*· \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὀνόματί|strong="G3686"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w* \w δαιμόνια|strong="G1140"\w* \w ἐκβαλοῦσιν|strong="G1544"\w*· \w γλώσσαις|strong="G1100"\w* \w λαλήσουσιν|strong="G2980"\w* \w καιναῖς|strong="G2537"\w*·\f + \fr 16:17 \ft καιναις \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,W (97.8%) HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ και εν ταις χερσιν 1 C (2.2%) [NU]\f*

\w ὄφεις|strong="G3789"\w* \w ἀροῦσιν|strong="G0142"\w*·\f + \fr 16:18 \ft οφεις αρουσιν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,W (97.4%) HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ και εν ταις χερσιν 12 C (2.2%) [NU] ¦ — (0.2%) ¦ omit verses 9-20 ℵ\+sup c\+sup*B\f* \w κἂν|strong="G2579"\w* \w θανάσιμόν|strong="G2286"\w* \w τι|strong="G5101"\w* \w πίωσιν|strong="G4095"\w*, \w οὐ|strong="G3756"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w αὐτοὺς|strong="G0846"\w* \w βλάψῃ|strong="G0984"\w*·\f + \fr 16:18 \ft βλαψη \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,C,W [95%] HF,RP,CP,NU ¦ βλαψει [5%] TR,OC\f* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w ἀρρώστους|strong="G0732"\w* \w χεῖρας|strong="G5495"\w* \w ἐπιθήσουσιν|strong="G2007"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w καλῶς|strong="G2573"\w* \w ἕξουσιν|strong="G2192"\w*.» The Ascension

\w Ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μὲν|strong="G3303"\w* \w οὖν|strong="G3767"\w* \w Κύριος|strong="G2962"\w*,\f + \fr 16:19 \ft κυριος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A (94.5%) HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ 1 ιησους C(W) (5.2%) NU ¦ ιησους (0.2%) ¦ one other variant\f* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w λαλῆσαι|strong="G2980"\w* \w αὐτοῖς|strong="G0846"\w*, \w ἀνελήφθη|strong="G0353"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w οὐρανὸν|strong="G3772"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐκάθισεν|strong="G2523"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w δεξιῶν|strong="G1188"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Ἐκεῖνοι|strong="G1565"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w ἐξελθόντες|strong="G1831"\w* \w ἐκήρυξαν|strong="G2784"\w* \w πανταχοῦ|strong="G3837"\w*, \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Κυρίου|strong="G2962"\w* \w συνεργοῦντος|strong="G4903"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w λόγον|strong="G3056"\w* \w βεβαιοῦντος|strong="G0950"\w* \w διὰ|strong="G1223"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐπακολουθούντων|strong="G1872"\w* \w σημείων|strong="G4592"\w*. \w Ἀμήν|strong="G0281"\w*.\f + \fr 16:20 \ft αμην \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* C,W (97.9%) HF,RP,CP,TR,OC ¦ — A (2.1%) NU\f*\sup ,\sup*\f + \fr 16:20 \ft have verses 9-20 \+it rell\+it* [[NU]] ¦ — ℵB (For a full discussion of this variant, please see Appendix E in my, \+it The Identity of the New Testament Text IV\+it*.)\f*\sup ,\sup*\f + \fr 16:20 \ft In the colophons, \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [50%] have, “published ten years after the ascension of Christ”. For 50% of the MSS to have this information probably means that the tradition is ancient; and of course, I have demonstrated, to my own satisfaction at least, that \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* goes back at least to the 3\+sup rd\+sup* century. If this information is correct, then Mark was ‘published’ in 40/41 AD. The same sources have Matthew published two years earlier (38/39) and Luke five years later (45/46), while John was ‘published’ thirty-two years after the ascension, or 61/62 AD. Not only were the authors eyewitnesses of the events, but many others were still alive when the Gospels appeared. They could attest to the veracity of the accounts, but could also be the source of textual variants, adding tidbits here and there, or ‘correcting’ something that they remembered differently.\f*\sup ,\sup*\f + \fr 16:20 \ft The citation of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* is based on the following fifty-three MSS—18, 35, 128, 141, 204, 510, 547, 553, 586, 645, 689, 789, 824, 928, 1023, 1040, 1072, 1075, 1111, 1117, 1133, 1145, 1147, 1199, 1251, 1339, 1384, 1435, 1461, 1496, 1503, 1572, 1628, 1637, 1652, 1667, 1705, 1713, 2122, 2221, 2253, 2261, 2323, 2352, 2382, 2466, 2503, 2554, 2765, 2875, 2876, Iviron 2110 and Leukosia 65 [the last two do not yet have a GA number, so far as I know]—all of which I collated myself. None of them is a ‘perfect’ representative of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* in Mark, as it stands [an unreasonable expectation, presumably, for a book this size, besides being a Gospel]. But 586 is only off by one letter, and its exemplar, and that of 35 and 2382, probably were perfect! And several other exemplars come close—that of 1628 was off by one variant, those of 510 and 2253 were off by two variants, those of 824, 1435, 1503 and 1637 were off by three, several by four, and so on. [This refers to the MSS I have collated—there may be even better ones out there! In fact, since I have collated perhaps 20% of the family representatives for this book, there probably are better ones out there.] The uniformity is impressive. Since these MSS come from all over the Mediterranean world (Sinai, Jerusalem, Cyprus, Patmos, Constantinople, Bucharest, Aegean, Tirana, Mt. Athos [nine different monasteries], Corinth\+sup ?\+sup*, Athens, Grottaferrata, Vatican, Leukosia, Kalavryta, Meteora, Lesbos, Sparta, etc.) they are certainly representative of the family, giving us the precise family profile—it is reflected in the Text without exception. In the statements of evidence I have included the percentage of manuscript attestation for each variant within either ( ) or [ ]. I have used ( ) for the evidence taken from \+it TuT\+it*, which I take to be reasonably precise. For the variant sets that are not covered there, I mainly depended on Legg (\+it Novum Testamentum Graece Secundum Westcotto-Hortianum.\+it* Evangelium Secundum Marcum [Ed. S.C.E. Legg, Oxonii: E. Typographeo Clarendoniano, 1935]). I occasionally supplemented from Swanson, Scrivener and von Soden—the percentages offered, I have used [ ] for these, are extrapolations based on a comparison of these sources. I venture to predict, if complete collations ever become available, that for any non-Byzantine variants listed with 5 to 1% support (in my apparatus) the margin of error should not exceed ±2%; for non-Byzantine variants listed with 10 to 6% support the margin of error should hardly exceed ±4%; where there is some division among the Byzantine witnesses the margin of error should rarely exceed ±15%—since my sources had collated a lower percentage of the extant MSS than \+it ECM\+it* for the General Epistles, for example, my guesses as to percentages are more tentative than they were there, except that I guarantee the witness of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup*. Please see the last footnote for Matthew for further information.\f*
